name: Gloo It
description:
If you're having issues with the audio in the WebGL version, please download the executable.

This game was made for the Mix and Game Jam.

The theme is dimension change: 

There is a weapon in the game "Prey", called Gloogun, I took the mechanic of this weapon and made it into a game, from 3D to 2D.

I've made everything myself, aside from a few generated sounds.
